function.name: manage_prompt
function.description: Manage the agent's prompt (add or delete a line, or list all lines and ids).

prompt_id.description: The ID of the prompt to delete. Required for 'delete'. First, list prompts to get the ID.

prompt_text.description: The new line of the prompt to add. Required for 'add'.

reasoning.description: The reasoning for the prompt. Required for 'add'.

function.name: memory
function.description: Perform memory operations: add, delete, list, or search for memories. Search now supports multiple criteria that can be combined.

memory.description: The memory to save. Required for 'add'.
memory.example: Slam Jackson is Randi's dog. He is a golden doodle.

category.description: The category of the memory, used for categorization and search. Must match one of the predefined categories: Health, Career, Family, Personal, Technical Projects, Social, Finance, Self-care, Environment, Hobbies, Admin, Philosophy.

priority.description: Priority level of the memory, where 0.0 is low priority and 1.0 is high priority. Required for 'add'.

memory_id.description: The ID of the memory to delete or search for. Required for 'delete', optional for 'search'.

keywords.description: Tags/keywords associated with the memory. Required for 'add', optional for 'search'. Can be combined with other search criteria.

topic_id.description: Search for memories associated with a specific topic ID. Optional for 'search', can be combined with other criteria.

min_keywords.description: Minimum number of matching keywords required when searching by keywords. Defaults to 2.

created_after.description: Return memories created after this timestamp (ISO format). Optional for 'search', can be combined with other criteria.

created_before.description: Return memories created before this timestamp (ISO format). Optional for 'search', can be combined with other criteria.

limit.description: Maximum number of memories to return for 'list' action. Default is 10.

offset.description: Offset for pagination in 'list' action. Default is 0.

function.name: tts
function.description: Toggle TTS/STT availability or retrieve TTS/STT status.

function.name: update_divoom
function.description: Update the Divoom Max to display an emoji.

emoji.description: The emoji to display on the Divoom Max. Use a valid emoji Unicode character.

function.name: github_issue
function.description: Create, close, list, view, comment, or list comments on a GitHub issue.

action.description: The action to perform on the GitHub issue.

issue_id.description: The ID of the issue to close, view, or list comments. Required for 'close', 'view', and 'list_comments'.

title.description: The title of the issue. Required for 'create'.

body.description: The body content of the issue. Required for 'create'.

assignees.description: List of usernames to assign to the issue. Optional for 'create' and 'list'.

labels.description: List of labels to apply to the issue. Optional for 'create' and 'list'.

options.description: Additional GitHub API options as a dict.

comment_body.description: The body of the comment to add to the issue. Required for 'comment'.

user_request.description: The natural language request to perform (e.g., 'turn on the living room lights').

device.description: The name of the device to control (e.g., 'living room lights').

text.description: The text content of the sticky note, used for create.

snooze.description: The snooze period. Format is ISO 8601 duration.

periodicity.description: The periodicity of the sticky note, used for create. (e.g., R/P1D) Format is ISO 8601 duration.

id.description: The ID of the sticky note, used to snooze or resolve.

date.description: The date for the sticky note, used for create. Format is ISO 8601 date.
